entry.content:
Welcome to my brand new blog

Content

This website will feature tales of daily struggles and random topics I think about.

95th percentile of all content will be about computer science, thatâ€™s how I roll yo!

  • Operating systems;
  • Open protocols;
  • Proprietary algorithms and protocols;

Dev

  1. Open the Publii desktop app;
  2. Create a new post;
  3. Preview the post;
  4. Publish the website.
  5. Profit (in all non-monetary forms)
